title: Projects
text: Below are a few highlights that show how I approach real problems end-to-end: clarify the question, build reliable data/ML pipelines, and communicate results to decision-makers.

title: Projects
section: Salary Prediction on Lightcast Job Postings
text:
Salary Prediction on Lightcast Job Postings
Role: Modeler & Analyst ‚Ä¢ Stack: PySpark, Python, Quarto ‚Ä¢ Topics: feature engineering, regression, evaluation

Built and compared GLR, Linear, Polynomial (quadratic in MIN_YEARS_EXPERIENCE), and Random Forest regressors.
Encoded categorical fields (freq-ordered + one-hot), enforced sanity filters, and assembled numeric features.
Assessed on RMSE, MAE, R¬≤ with a clean 80/20 train‚Äìtest split; produced actual-vs-pred visuals and feature importance.
Delivered a Quarto report with reproducible code and figures.

Highlights - Fast, inspectable pipeline with consistent splits and metric tables. - Clear visuals for stakeholder readouts (test set focus, no leakage).
Links - Add when ready: Repository ‚Ä¢ Report



Plot placeholder

title: Projects
text:
Financial Reporting Automation (Liberty Mutual)
Role: Analyst (Accounting ‚Üí Analytics) ‚Ä¢ Stack: SQL, Python, Power BI

Streamlined AP/close workflows supporting $50M in transactions and $1‚Äì3M weekly payments.
Automated reconciliation checks and reserve/asset-coverage calculations to reduce manual effort.
Partnered with finance leadership to align metrics and definitions; published refreshed dashboards.

Impact - Fewer reconciliation defects and faster time-to-close.

title: Projects
text:
Technical Support Ops Optimization (Quanterix)
Role: Ops & Analytics ‚Ä¢ Stack: Salesforce, JIRA, Excel/Power BI

Triaged global service requests, standardized categories/SLAs, and audited closed cases monthly.
Designed a training program (docs + how-to videos) for new coordinators.
Improved throughput and documentation quality across the service desk.

Impact - Clear ownership, faster routing, and more reliable reporting.

title: Projects
text:
This Website (Quarto + GitHub Pages)
Role: Designer/Implementer ‚Ä¢ Stack: Quarto, GitHub Actions/Pages

Built an accessible, fast personal site with a minimal brand.
Organized for employers: About, Projects, CV, Contact (no ‚Äúdata cleaning/exploration‚Äù tabs).
Image optimization and consistent typography for a professional look.

Links - Add when live: Site URL ‚Ä¢ Source Repo

title: Projects
text:
What I‚Äôm Exploring Next

Packaging the Lightcast pipeline for parameterized re-runs and CI checks.
Adding lightweight experiment tracking and a model comparison dashboard.
